title: Wii balance board sampling frequency
content:
I'm looking for the maximum sampling rate of the Wii Balance Board for studying statokinesiograms (2D path of the ground projection of the center of pressure). Some source indicates a sampling rate of 100Hz. Another mentions 60Hz, and a serious reference is using the WBB at 40Hz !

The related patent does not provide this information but mention 60Hz "as an example" (page 13). I suppose the bottleneck in frequency would be the microprocessor speed, as several pressure acquisitions could be transmitted at once with the bluetooth module.

answers_data.content: After having performed a few tests, we derived this histogram of the interval between two successive data points received. The largest peak correspond to a frequency of 40Hz.
